description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styling, and the main App component, and renders the App component inside the root DOM node.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render React elements into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root created.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A component that helps highlight potential problems in an application.
